note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: simple bookmarklet to style legacy forum the way I want
body:
# Simple Bookmarklet for Magic Cafe forum

This bookmarklet allows you to pick which sub-forums you want to display and removes all others. 
It also removes the bold green colour and instead replaces it with a black/grey alternate.
name: Magic Cafe Bookmarklet
